I like to use only Free Open Source Software where possible and I dislike ads, surveillance capitalism and unaccountable big tech companies having visibility or control of my data. So my main machine is a coreboot Debian desktop running a locked down Firefox with ad-blocking. My phone runs LineageOS with only open source apps downloaded from F-Droid synced to Nextcloud. I only use open source clients and the Fediverse for social, mailbox.org for email (colin at nvv dot is) and XMPP for chat (colinwills at disroot dot org). Love Daft Punk and Wild Boar.
